title: Immune v0.8.2
description:
About This Game
Experience true survival with a wink in the world of Immune - the new open-world online game.
Survive the wastelands with the help of your friends and your hand crafted weapons. Build your own fort to defend yourself and your hard earned loot from evil mutants, bandits or reckless players.
Features:

    Sandbox online RPG with full PVP/PVE
    Solve missions and get rewarded with XP and loot cases
    Collect hats in your Steam Inventory
    Scavange materials and food in the post apocalyptic wastelands
    Raid NPC enemies or other players
    Craft & build your own structures and weapons
    Plant, grow and harvest your own food to survive
    Drive vehicles like military SUVs
    Tame wild dogs with food and make them your bodyguards
    Conditions, trading, medicine, fishing and so much more to discover!
